scripts.build: rimraf dist && ui5 build self-contained --include-task=generateManifestBundle generateCachebusterInfo
scripts.build-for-deploy: npm run build && npm run flatten && npm run clean-after-flatten
scripts.flatten: cp -r dist/resources/errorhandler/library/* dist && cp dist/resources/errorhandler/library/.library dist && cp dist/resources/.Ui5RepositoryTextFiles dist
